description:
Battlestation: Quixotic

Are you looking for a fast paced arcade game with silky smooth touchscreen controls?
 
Well then... let's get to it...
 
Take command of Earth's last remaining line of defense against the invasion forces of the Beta-8 Alliance. You command Quixotic, the last remaining orbiting defense platform. Your Battlestation is equipped with an 8-way laser cannon system, capable of impressive firepower. Power-ups will beam to your area from time to time to increase the capabilities of Quixotic... supercannon, laser saw, and lightning nuke are only a few of the special weapons that will become available to you during the battle.
 
The enemy is fanatically committed to your destruction and the defeat of Earth's forces. The enemy will try to shoot you down then they'll try to ram your station. Repel this attack at all costs. 

You'll encounter ram ships, bombers, fighters, scout ships, sniper ships, and the awe-inspiring firepower of the wicked Girtan Gunship... not to mention the appearance of those dastardly Beta-8 Generals including that nasty little germ-thing in a diaper. 
The survival of the people of Earth hangs in the balance! 

Features:
 
Progressive difficulty levels including survival waves and meteor storms!
Intuitive 8-Way laser cannon system to defend the Quixotic station! 
Retro-inspired intensely addictive gameplay! 
Amazing left/right handed touch-screen controls! (however, we suggest you use both thumbs.. seriously)
Power-ups, bonus-points, and hull-healing warp cores!
Excellent arcade-type sound effects and music!
An assortment of stylish enemies with varied attack strategies!
Bone cracking boss battles!
Retro-inspired HD graphics & cool special effects! 

We'll see you onboard the Quixotic!
Good luck, Commander.
 
Check out our website! 
www.crushcrumble.com
